Title: Mortal Kombat: The Journey Begins
Actors: Jeff Bennett, Jim Cummings, Ron Feinberg, Jennifer Hale
Plot: As the three chosen defenders of Earth travel to the Kombat Island, Rayden teaches them how to be the masters of their destinys, how to overcome their foes, and how to control their powers. Liu Kang, Sonya Blade and Johnny Cage must defeat Shang Tsung, Sub Zero, Scorpion and Goro if they are to survive this challenge to decide the fate of the earth.
